item.title: 3 Chinese nationals charged with smuggling Nvidia, HP chips to China
item.description: The DOJ alleges they were involved in a scheme to ship chips to China.

item.title: Jobs report blows past expectations, defying hiring slowdown
item.description: The fresh jobs data arrives about six weeks after its initially scheduled release due to the government shutdown.

item.title: WATCH: Drone shows Ukraine apartment block devastated by Russian strike
item.description: At least 26 people, including three children, were killed in Russian strikes on the Ukrainian city of Ternopil.

item.title: Walmart raises profit expectations as more Americans hunt deals in sluggish economy
item.description: Walmart delivered another standout quarter, posting strong sales and profits that blew past Wall Street expectations as it wins over more cash-strappe...

item.title: WATCH: Accused wife killer pleads guilty to disposal of body
item.description: A Massachusetts man accused of killing and dismembering his wife in 2023 has pleaded guilty to disposing her body.
